citations.narrative:
Item Primary Enclosures 3.53 a 1
At the time of inspection it was noted that the rabbit pens had loose and broken wire mesh which could injure the
animal
Facility needs to repair/replace the broken wire mesh in order to protect and contain the animal
Correct by 9/18/2017
An exit interview took place at the end of inspection with the operations manager
